PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-05772016-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectInternational Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea, 1974
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to BRING INTO FORCE for Canada the Amendments adding chapter XIV to the INTERNATIONAL CONVENTION FOR THE SAFETY OF LIFE AT SEA, 1974, adopted by the Marine Safety Committee of the International Maritime Organization on November 21, 2014, and the amendments to annexes I, II, IV and V of the Protocol of 1978 relating to the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, 1973, adopted by the Marine Environment Protection Committee of the International Maritime Organization on May 15, 2015.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
